mathew subharanchiyehi sadahan mema warthawa eෙthihasika siddhiya kerehi yam gatalusahagatha thathwayak uda karayi.enam,shasthrawanthayin hata jerusalame sita kilomitara 10k nudurin wana bethlehema kara yamata tharuwaka maga penwimak awashya wuye ayida yannaya.bethleheme tharuwa ho shasthrawanthayin pilibanda sandahan karana ekama subharanchiya mathew pamani.nuthana widwathun mak subharanchiya paranima subharanchiya[54] lesa pilaganna athara ehi bethleheme uthpaththi kathawa pilibanda sandahan nowe.[55]johan subharanchiye ena charithaya jesuswahanse galilayek bawa sandahan karana athara bethlehemen nowana bawa kiyayi.[56]

doshabhiyogaya wibhaga wu samaye ras wu nithignya sangamaya doshabhiyogayata "erehiwa" diyaru yojana kihipayak sammatha kaleya.doshabhiyogaya gana salaka balannayi rajayen illa sitima, pathkarana nawa agawinisuru piliganima sadaha sampradayikawa pawathwana uthsawayata sahabhagi nowi sitima eki yojana gonnata ayathya.nawa agawinisuruwa pathkala pasu niwedanayak nikuth kala nithignya sangamaya prakasha kota sitiye ohu yatathe samanya lesa rajakari kirimata thamun sudanam bawayi.mema niwedanaya nikuth karana ladde nithignya sangamaye sabhapathi athulu kandayamak araliya gaha mandirayedi janadhipathi samaga pawathwu sakachchawakin ikbithiya.
